mapper.select: select * from FOXBPM_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where PROCESS_KEY = #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VERSION = (select max(VERSION) from FOXBPM_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where PROCESS_KEY = #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select * from FOXBPM_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where DEPLOYMENT_ID = #{deploymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROCESS_KEY = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from FOXBPM_DEF_PROCESSDEFINITION where PROCESS_KEY = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update foxbpm_def_processdefinition set PROCESS_KEY = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPLOYMENT_ID = #{deploymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIAGRAM_RESOURCE_NAME = #{diagramResourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_ID = #{record.resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PROCESS_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
